title: MINI - worldwide sales volume 2006 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in units, containing a total of 13 data points.
In general Sales in units has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Sales in units, about 371881.0 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Sales in units about 188077.0 was reached at Year 2006
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in units, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Sales in units has increased over the Year.

Sales in units is slightly increasing from 2006 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, slightly increasing from 2008 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, and finally roughly constant from 2015 to 2018.
